=========
AcquiRest
=========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/acquirest.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/acquirest

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/riiy/acquirest.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/riiy/acquirest

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/acquirest/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://acquirest.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?version=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




AcquiRest is a web service that turns PostgreSQL database into RESTful API.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://acquirest.readthedocs.io.
